Package com.example.belongingsbuddy

package com.example.belongingsbuddy
  • Class
    Description
    AddItemActivity
    Activity for adding an Item to the user's dataList.
    CameraActivity
    An abstract class for any activity that uses a single camera.
    CreateTagActivity
     
    CustomList
    An instance of this class represents a subclass of ArrayAdapter that also supports multiselection.
    DataListTest
    Tests the functionality of the sumItems method and dataList
    Date
    Date represents a date on the calendar by its year, month, and day; The Class uses standard getter and setter methods
    DatePickerFragment
    Intuitive Dialog from which the user may select a date from the calendar
    DateTest
    Tests the functionality of the Date class
    EditItemActivity
    Activity for editing an Item from the user's dataList.
    EditItemActivityTest
    Tests functionality of AddItemActivity
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FilterItemsFragment
    A DialogFragment subclass that represents a filter dialog for items in the Belongings Buddy app.
    FilterItemsTest
    Tests functionality of filter items
    ImagePagerAdapter
     
    Item
    an instance of this class represent an Item that the app will add to the inventory the class uses standard setter and getter methods
    ItemTest
    Tests the functionality of the Item class; NOTE: currently Item class does not work with Tags and Photos, this will be implemented for the final product
    ItemViewActivity
    Activity for viewing the details of an Item from the user's dataList
    ItemViewActivityTest
    Tests functionality of ItemViewActivity.
    Listener
    The Listener interface provides callback methods for interacting with sorting and input operations in the BelongingsBuddy application.
    ListViewTest
    Runs a series of tests related to adding, editing, and deleting items in the ListView.
    LoginActivity
     
    LoginButtonsTest
    Tests the functionality of all the buttons in the LoginActivity Tests user input verification with testSignUp being tested first and the account on the Firebase Authentication Console with the email test@gmail.com must be deleted before hand UNIT TESTING COULD NOT BE DONE FOR THIS ACTIVITY AS FIRESTORE AUTH DOES NOT ALLOW THE USE OF FIREBASE AUTH IN TESTING ENVIRONMENTS, AND CANNOT BE MOCKED BY MOCKITO
    MainActivity
     
    MainActivityUserButtonTest
    Test class that tests the functionality of the user button and signout functionality

    PhotoTakingActivity
    An activity for taking photos.
    PhotoTakingTest
    UI tests for photo taking
    ScannerActivity
    An activity used for scanning barcodes using a camera.
    ScannerTest
    UI tests for barcode scanning
    ScanOrManual
    Displays a dialog with three buttons and a prompt; the "Scan barcode" Button will start an activity where the user can scan barcode of an item they want to add to inventory; the "Input manually" Button will start an activity where the user has to manually input the information for a new item; the "Cancel" button will close the Dialog;
    SelectButtons
     
    SortingTest
    Runs a series of tests related to sorting items
    SortItemsFragment
    Displays a dialog with 4 selection buttons, cancel and confirm, and a radio group of 2 Whatever button is clicked last before hitting confirm will be the sort type to be performed.
    Tag
    Tag class which encapsulates a string
    TagActivity
     
    TagArrayAdapter
    ArrayAdapter class for Tag creation
    TagListener
    The TagListener interface provides a callback method for classes which require tag selection
    TagManager
    Manager class for all things tag related
    TotalTest
    Tests functionality of total feature
    UsernameDialogFragment
    Displays a dialog with two buttons and a title the "Sign Out" button will bring the user back to the beginning of the Login Activity Will also sign them out of FirebaseAuth removing them as current user the "Cancel" Button returns to MainActivity
    ViewFilterFragment
    A DialogFragment subclass that represents a filter dialog for items in the Belongings Buddy app.
